pageContext.claim: “As you all know, I approved the Keystone XL pipeline and the Dakota Access Pipeline in my first week. Thousands of jobs, tremendous things are happening.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump approved it on the fourth day of his president. Trump's claims about the numbers of jobs that would be created changes from day to day but it is always inflated. The actual number of Keystone construction jobs, for instance, is just 3,900 on an annualized basis — and other jobs have already been created (such as for building high-strength line pipe.) In the context of the U.S. economy, these are not many jobs.
